name.ja: キングス・オーソリティ

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster during their turn.

effect.en: Choose face-up Level 4 or higher Effect Monsters on your opponent's field, up to [the number of face-up Level 5 or higher LIGHT Attribute Fiend Type monsters on your field]. This turn, your opponent cannot activate their effects, nor Tribute them for a Tribute Summon.
